sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PhoneNumberDependent</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>AJAX call to get the PhoneTerritory from a dependent value change</description>
        <name>PhoneNumberDependent</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PhoneNumberDependent = Class.create();
PhoneNumberDependent.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	process: function() {
		var dependent = this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id');
		var gePN = new GlideElementPhoneNumber();
		var userPhoneFormat = gePN.getPhoneFormatForUser(dependent);
		if (userPhoneFormat == null)
			userPhoneFormat = gePN.getPhoneFormatForLocation(dependent);
		if (userPhoneFormat != null) {
			var optionValue = userPhoneFormat.getGlobalDialingCode() + ","
				+ userPhoneFormat.getLocalDialingCode() + ","
				+ userPhoneFormat.isLocalFollowsGlobal();
		
			return escape(userPhoneFormat.getTerritory()) + "," + escape(optionValue);
		}
		return "";
	},

	type: 'PhoneNumberDependent'
});

]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2013-06-28 07:46:49</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>30087220eb1201007128a5fc5206fe2c</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PhoneNumberDependent</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="E164 Compliant Phone Number" source="com.glide.phone_number">e021890f6d2620100acb70b3534330bd</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_30087220eb1201007128a5fc5206fe2c</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2013-07-08 15:55:15</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>735</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
